name: Cecil Knight
text: Provided training course for staff.  Handicapped entrance now and parking spots next to building.  Wheelchair access to all office areas.  First became a vendor in 2003.  Car crash and wheelchair in 2013.  A year or so later, they rebuilt a restroom to allow easy wheelchair entrance.  I appreciate how they went out of their way to make this a great experience.  Thanks to them.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. At Argos, we build partnerships with our employees, customers and communities!

name: Nigel Page
text: Every one there is super friendly

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Argos Cement

name: Thomas Coulter
text: Nicest Argos I've ever worked at

resp.text: Damon, thank you for your partnership. Argos Cement
Thank you for review, at Argos Cement we build we build partnerships with our customers and communities!
Dear Gary, thanks for sharing your feedback. We’re sorry your experience didn’t match your expectations. We’ll do better in the future.

name: Rachel Thomas
text:
(Translated by Google) ...... ..... Rude Rude Rude!

(Original)
Rude.....Rude......Rude!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your feedback. We’re sorry your experience didn’t match your expectations. We’ll strive to do better.
